subject.verbatim: Alien tropical coastline at night with palm islets tessellated ocean surface and a giant geodesic ringed moon in the sky.

shot.framing: low shoreline vantage camera ~0.6m above wet tessellated water islets and palms centered mid-distance
shot.motion: slow push-in dolly forward from shore toward islets no secondary moves

scene.environment: calm surf over triangular mosaic tiles that shimmer faint gold black lava rocks sparse palms on tiny islets misty blue mountains far background starry sky with a pale sun on horizon and a massive translucent geodesic ringed moon overhead
scene.weather: clear slight haze over water gentle onshore breeze

beats.action: Waves lap over the tessellated shore golden lines glint as foam recedes foreground rocks pass frame edges creating parallax.
beats.focus: texture of wet tiles and foam micro-ripples

beats.action: Push-in reveals palm islets moonlight back-rim on palm fronds distant mountains emerge through haze.
Geodesic ringed moon dominates upper frame gold lattice reflections ripple across water final hold for 0.5s for a clean endpoint.
beats.focus: celestial dome and shimmering water grid
